trans-unit.source: Configuration common to all security token handlers.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurasjon er felles for alle sikkerhet token behandlingsprogrammer.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the audience restriction.
The audience restriction.
Gets or sets the caches that are used for this configuration.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hurtigbuffere som brukes for denne konfigurasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The caches.
Gets or sets the X.509 certificate validation mode used by handlers to validate issuer certificates.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir X.509 sertifikatet validering modusen som brukes av behandlingsprogrammer til å validere utsteder sertifikater.

trans-unit.source: The certificate validation mode.
Gets or sets the X.509 certificate validator used by handlers to validate issuer certificates
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir X.509 sertifikatet validerer brukes med referanser til å validere utsteder sertifikater

trans-unit.source: The certificate validator.
Specifies the default X.509 certificate validation mode.
To be added.
Specifies the default X.509 certificate validator instance.
To be added.
Specifies a value that determines whether to detect replayed tokens; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, do not detect replayed tokens.
trans-unit.target: Angir en verdi som bestemmer om det skal registreres gjentas tokener; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, ikke registrerer gjentas tokener.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Specifies the default issuer name registry instance; an instance of the configuration-based issuer name registry.
trans-unit.target: Angir standard utsteder navnet registret forekomst. en forekomst av konfigurasjonen basert utsteder navnet registret.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Specifies the default issuer token resolver instance.
trans-unit.target: Angir standard utsteder token Løsningsprogrammet forekomst.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Specifies the default maximum clock skew.
To be added.
Specifies the default X.509 certificate revocation mode.
To be added.
Specifies whether to save bootstrap tokens; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, bootstrap tokens are not saved.
trans-unit.target: Angir om du vil lagre bootstrap tokener; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, bootstrap token er ikke lagret.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Specifies the default token replay cache expiration period.
trans-unit.target: Angir standard token spill hurtigbufferen utløp.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Specifies the default X.509 certificate trusted store location.
trans-unit.target: Angir standard X.509 sertifikatet er klarert store plassering.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether replayed tokens should be detected by handlers in this configuration.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om gjentas token må være registrert ved behandlingsprogrammer i denne konfigurasjonen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if replayed tokens should be detected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis gjentas tokener skal oppdages; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the issuer name registry for this configuration.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir utstederen navnet registret for denne konfigurasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The issuer name registry.
Gets or sets the issuer token resolver for this configuration.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir utsteder token Løsningsprogrammet for denne konfigurasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The issuer token resolver.
Gets or sets the maximum clock skew for handlers using this configuration.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den maksimale klokken skjevfordeling for behandlingsprogrammer med denne konfigurasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The maximum clock skew.
Gets or sets the X.509 revocation mode for this configuration.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir X.509 opphevelse modus for denne konfigurasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 revocation mode.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the bootstrap context (token) is saved in the <xref href="System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity"></xref> and Sessions after token validation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om bootstrap konteksten (token) er lagret i den <xref href="System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity"> </xref> og økter etter token validering.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to save the bootstrap token; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Lagre bootstrap tokenet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the security token resolver to use to resolve service tokens.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir sikkerhet token Løsningsprogrammet brukes til å løse service-token.

trans-unit.source: The token resolver.
Gets or sets the expiration period for items put in the token replay cache.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir utløpsperiode for elementer Plasser i hurtigbufferen for token avspilling.

trans-unit.source: The expiration period.
Gets or sets the X.509 trusted store location used by handlers to validate issuer certificates.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den X.509 klarert lagringsplasseringen brukes med referanser til å validere utsteder sertifikater.

trans-unit.source: The trusted store location.
